metadata.name: Resurrection Perverts: Hunter's Point
metadata.description: In a near-future world porn publisher Harry Homburg clings to the hope that exclusive photos of a US President caught in flagrante delicto will save his crumbling business. Unfortunately, the universe has other plans for him. He will travel beyond the boundaries of our world, to a strange place where the rules of existence are subject to the whims of unseen entities. This biting social satire is presented in vivid full color, one scene per page, like a series of smartphone screens. Danny Hellman has worked as an illustrator since 1988. He lives in Brooklyn, NY with his wife and daughter.
